subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Yoenis Cespedes has put up phenomenal numbers since joining the Mets, but no player has ever won an M.V.P. award after being traded midseason.
snippet: Yoenis Cespedes has put up phenomenal numbers since joining the Mets, but no player has ever won an M.V.P. award after being traded midseason.
